module Persist.Mongo.SlowPull where

import Persist.Mongo.SlowPull.Internal
import Persist.Mongo.Settings
import Data.Conduit
import Database.Persist
import Data.Time
import qualified Data.Conduit.List as CL
import Control.Applicative
import Control.Concurrent

import qualified Data.Map as M
import qualified Data.Set as S
import Data.Maybe
import Prelude
import System.IO
import Data.List
import Control.Monad.IO.Class
import Control.Monad
import Data.Function
import qualified Data.ByteString.Lazy as LBS
import Data.Aeson
import Persist.Mongo.SlowPull.Types
import Data.Acid.Advanced
import Data.Acid
import Tach.Impulse.Types.TimeValue

import Data.Time.Clock.POSIX


getOnpingTagList :: MongoDBConf -> OffsetCountStore -> Int -> Int -> IO [Entity OnpingTagHistory]
getOnpingTagList mongoConf offsetStore limit daysBack = do
  ct <- getCurrentTime
  offset <- query' offsetStore PeekOffset
  putStrLn $ "Current offset: " ++ show offset
  let youngest = Just $ addUTCTime (fromIntegral (daysBack * 24 * 60 * 60 * (-1))) ct
  onpingTags <- liftIO $ runDBConf mongoConf $ selectList [OnpingTagHistoryTime <. youngest] [LimitTo limit, OffsetBy offset]
  return onpingTags

pullN :: MongoDBConf -> OffsetCountStore -> Int -> Int -> IO [(Int, [TVNoKey])]
pullN mongoConf offsetStore lim daysBack = getOnpingTagList mongoConf offsetStore lim daysBack >>= return . pairTags


dbConfSource :: MongoDBConf -> OffsetCountStore -> Int -> Int -> Source IO (Entity OnpingTagHistory)
dbConfSource mongoConf ( offsetStore) limit daysBack = forever $ do
  ct <- liftIO $ getCurrentTime
  offset <- query' offsetStore PeekOffset
  let youngest = Just $ addUTCTime (fromIntegral (daysBack * 24 * 60 * 60 * (-1))) ct
  onpingTags <- liftIO $ runDBConf mongoConf $ selectList [OnpingTagHistoryTime <. youngest] [LimitTo limit, OffsetBy offset]
  _ <- liftIO $ putStrLn $ "Current offset: " ++ show offset
  CL.sourceList onpingTags

toJSONConduit :: ToJSON a => Conduit a IO LBS.ByteString
toJSONConduit = CL.map encode

writeOnpingListSink :: Sink [(OnpingTagHistory,Key OnpingTagHistory)] IO ()
writeOnpingListSink = do
  ct <- liftIO getCurrentTime
  CL.mapM_ $ liftIO . (LBS.writeFile ((show ct) ++ "test.out")) . LBS.concat . map encode

-- | A source for a list of onping tag histories 
-- | that provides a list of OnpingTagHistory of length lim
slowPullN :: MongoDBConf -> OffsetCountStore -> Int -> Int -> Source IO [(Int, [TVNoKey])]
slowPullN conf offsetStore lim daysBack = (dbConfSource conf offsetStore lim daysBack) $= (takeHistoryList lim) $= pairTagsList

sortOnpingList :: Conduit [Entity OnpingTagHistory] IO [Entity OnpingTagHistory]
sortOnpingList = CL.map $ sortBy (compare `on` onpingTagHistoryPid . entityVal)

takeHistoryList ::Int -> Conduit (Entity OnpingTagHistory) IO [Entity OnpingTagHistory]
takeHistoryList limit = CL.sequence $ CL.take limit

pairTagsList :: Conduit [Entity OnpingTagHistory] IO [(Int, [TVNoKey])]
pairTagsList = CL.map pairTags

pairTags :: [Entity OnpingTagHistory] -> [(Int, [TVNoKey])]
pairTags tagList = S.toList . S.fromList $ map (\(p,set) -> (p, S.toList set)) $ M.toList $ foldl' insertIntoMap M.empty tagList
  where insertIntoMap :: M.Map Int (S.Set TVNoKey) -> Entity OnpingTagHistory -> M.Map Int (S.Set TVNoKey)
        insertIntoMap othMap eOth = 
          case mNK of
            Just nk ->
              case (M.lookup pid othMap) of
                Just set ->  M.insert pid (S.insert nk set) othMap
                Nothing -> M.insert pid (S.singleton nk) othMap
            Nothing -> othMap
          where (Just pid) = onpingTagHistoryPid oth
                oth = entityVal eOth
                mNK = othToTVNoKey oth

onpingHistoryToTVSimple :: Conduit [(OnpingTagHistory, Key OnpingTagHistory)] IO (Int,[TVNoKey], [Key OnpingTagHistory])
onpingHistoryToTVSimple = CL.map $ (\x -> let list = (catMaybes (map (othToTVNoKey . fst) x))
                                              pid = othToPid . fst $ x !! 1
                                              slist = map snd x
                                          in (pid, list, slist) )

othToTVNoKey :: OnpingTagHistory -> Maybe TVNoKey
othToTVNoKey (OnpingTagHistory (_) (Just t) (Just v)) = Just $ TVNoKey time  v
                                                              where time :: Int
                                                                    time = round . realToFrac . utcTimeToPOSIXSeconds $ t
othToTVNoKey _ = Nothing

othToPid :: OnpingTagHistory -> Int
othToPid (OnpingTagHistory (Just p) _ _) = p
othToPid _ = -1
